title: Turning off new Android 11 features.
content:
Hi,
There are 2 features I would like to turn off and restore to how they where in android 10. 

1. Turn off media controls. I prefer the media controls as a notification, and not added to my quick settings.

2. Adding suggested apps back.
When you opened up the recent apps menu, at the bottom, there was a Google search bar and about 5 suggested apps + the app drawer. This functionality has been replaced with "screenshot" and "search" and I have no use for either of these buttons,and would like to reverse it to how it was in Android 9 and 10.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
